This month, Ruth Holloway will present Subtle Magic: Moving to Dancer2/DBIx::Class/TT.

"Read the documentation", we're toldâ€¦but there's always more to learn. When I started working with Dancer2, DBIx::Class, and Template Toolkit last fall, I'd seen the basics, but I found out /very/ quickly that there's much more to learn. The capabilities of this stack can influence application design from the ground upâ€“database tables, all the way to the final frameworks you might choose to use on the frontend, and not all of those repercussions are immediately clear from merely reading the documentation!

In this talk, we'll learn about some of the strengths of these modules and demonstrate how their capabilities can be leveraged to help you work faster and write great web-based applications.
entry.title: Subtle Magic: Moving to Dancer2/DBIx::Class/TT

entry.content: This talk will discuss using Ansible as a multiserver workflow automation system. I'll explain why I chose Ansible for this purpose and compare its strengths and weaknesses with some of the alternatives. We'll walk through several Ansible playbooks to show how complex build- test-deploy workflows can be iteratively constructed from much simpler parts.
